attributes.action: retain concessionary travel freedom passes for age 60s and over 60s
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition is currently active to gain support to abolish concessionary travel for age 60s plus. This petition is in support to retain this vital service for fixed income residents, majority being pensioners, who cannot afford the ever-increasing travel fares to get to medical/hospital appt's. or to shops. We challenge the petitioner and supporters who want to abolish this invaluable service for our elderly residents to be able to afford travel expenses on £90./week for all living expenses, i.e. food, utility bills, benefit housing and council tax, annual T.V. Licence for under 75s. This is a vital link to be retained, indefinitely!
